description: CSC requires a supplier with experience in digital transformation, information technology systems development and integration, and correctional services to deliver an enterprise digital strategy
duration_in_months: The estimated duration is not specified
full_summary:
================================(Locale English)

### Digital Strategy Tier 1

#### Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: cb-857-22443854
- **Solicitation Number**: 21118-23-4066890/B
- **Publication Date**: 2024-01-08
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-06 14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: 2024-02-06
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-03-01
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-10-31

#### Tender Description

Correctional Service Canada invites bids for the delivery of an Enterprise Digital Strategy. Suppliers with experience in digital transformation, information technology systems development and integration, particularly within the correctional services and public sector domain, are invited to submit their bids.

The successful supplier will deliver a comprehensive digital strategy, including:

- Identifying business and technical capabilities to improve IT service delivery
- Re-imagining business processes to align with the digital strategy
- Defining the target state and required technologies
- Realigning existing activities into an integrated digital strategy
- Identifying target state knowledge, skills, and abilities

The work is expected to include a comprehensive approach, with a focus on improving and innovating IT services delivery. Bidders are required to submit a bid for all resource categories.

#### Contract Details

- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Selection Criteria**: Variations or combinations of methods
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Contact Information

- **Name**: Jason St-Onge
- **Email**: [jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: (506) 269-3765
- **Address**: 340 Laurier Avenue, West, Ottawa, ON,
